name: Witches Adventures
description:
Witches Adventures

In a world where people are blessed with magic qualities is something common, this game focuses on BTS, a Magic Squad whose vessels, got stolen by an upcoming Magic Squad, LOONΔ. 

Witches Adventures is a fanmade BTSxLOONΔ RPG by Lilycal made in WOLF RPG Editor. 

This is just a demo, the game is still under development! You can follow updates on the project here: https://twitter.com/wiadv_gam
